question: India is set to send a 75-member Tri-Service contingent to participate in the Victory Day parade of which country?
explanation:
Russia is to conduct a military parade in Moscow on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of their victory in the Second World War.
The Defence Minister of Russia has invited an Indian contingent to take part in the Victory Day Parade scheduled to be held on June 24, 2020 in Moscow. It was originally scheduled on the occasion of the Victory Day - May 9, but later postponed due to Covid-19. India is sending a 75-member Tri-Service contingent to participate in the parade.
